Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, north of Danielle's Mystic Mage Emporium.
Room.LongDescription: Often considered one of the most powerful mages of modern time, Mistress Danielle Chanteclaire reached the status of Arch-Mage faster than any known previous spellcaster. Her powers are most likely stronger than the Keslar Mages, but they have never had a reason to test their spell- casting abilities on each other.
